ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed and drained
1 teaspoon dry ranch salad dressing mix
des: "This recipe is a quick and easy alternative to the traditional 7 layer salad. Great for summer get togethers."
ins: In a large bowl, gently mix the peas, sour cream, Cheddar cheese, green onions, celery, tomatoes, and bacon pieces. Season with salt, pepper, and dry ranch salad dressing mix. Chill at least 1 hour before serving.
